ygData.messageBody:
goto the link "onelist.com" or something....enter you email address and
password you used to get the list, then just click Member underneath. Next
just uncheck the list from your profile.

-----Original Message-----
From: Shane [mailto:xscion@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 20, 1999 11:50 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] *************************** LARGE SPOILER
******************************


From: "Shane" <xscion@...>

Sorry, I have to let everybody know. I do know where the Manastone is. In
the basement of Guk there is a room guarded by two Frogloks. Inside this
room is a Lesser Dragon. Hehe, anybody want to guess who I'm about to tell
you has the Manastone? :)


P.S. I'm sorry to say, but this newsgroup is way too much spam for my
inbox. Could somebody be so kind to tell me how I am able to remove myself
from it? Thanks.
